short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables showing a preview of the full file from the GitHub search results page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to preview the full file of a search result directly from the global GitHub code search screen. Tired of having to Ctrl + Click every result and jump back and forth between a bunch of tabs? With "GitHub Search Preview", you can quickly preview each full search result in an in-context dialog element. Stay in the flow.

- Preview full files directly from the search results page
- Copy to clipboard
- Jump to file detail page
- "Esc" to close
